name: Wadanohara and the Great Blue Sea -Reboot
name_original: Wadanohara and the Great Blue Sea -Reboot
description:
*The language of this game is Japanese.
Please refer to the following site for the translated version. http://funamusea.com/story/wadanohara_re/
http://funamusea.com/story/wadanohara/
❖ ❖ ❖

❖Synopsis
A clear blue sea under a beautiful blue sky.
After a long departure, the sea witch Wadanohara travels back home with her familiars.
But her ex-familiar, the shark Samekichi, appears to block her way:
"You shouldn't be here... Leave this sea, right now."
⚠️Caution!
gore, violence
❖ ❖ ❖
